query:
SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(p.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId
WHERE c.parentId = 8
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY c.displayOrder;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vUuSS4u8JGEyYT.root --database 8WruFPRUxPMzzwD4ZeeUDg --execute 
SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(p.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId
WHERE c.parentId = 8
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY c.displayOrder;
